description: Visuals emphasizing the transformation of waste gas into valuable resources and environmental compliance.

prompts.name: Flare to Value Transformation
prompts.prompt: A dramatic split image or composite. One side shows a large, burning gas flare stack against a dark sky, symbolizing waste and pollution. The other side shows a clean, modern gas processing facility or a modular power generation unit, with subtle blue/green energy glows, symbolizing value creation and environmental responsibility. A clear visual line or arrow connecting the two sides. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: impactful, transformative, clean. Colors: Fiery oranges/reds on one side, cool blues/greens on the other, incorporating SEES brand colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981). Lighting: High contrast. Focus: Problem-solution, sustainability, profitability.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Excellent for a before-and-after visual or a quick transition video. Emphasize the dramatic change.

prompts.name: Compliance & Profit Dashboard
prompts.prompt: A professional (Nigerian, male or female) in a control room or office, pointing confidently at a large digital dashboard. The screen displays key performance indicators: a downward trend in CO2 emissions, an upward trend in revenue generated from gas monetization, and a green checkmark for regulatory compliance. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: analytical, professional, results-oriented. Colors: Corporate blues and greens, with data visualizations in clear, positive tones, incorporating SEES brand colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981). Lighting: Bright, focused on the screen. Focus: Tangible results, compliance, profitability.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Close-up on the dashboard metrics. Could be a short video showing the graphs animating to demonstrate positive trends.

description: Visuals highlighting clean, cost-effective energy solutions for industrial and power generation sectors.

prompts.name: Modular Gas-to-Power Unit
prompts.prompt: A sleek, modern, modular gas-to-power generation unit installed at an industrial facility. The unit should look compact and efficient, with clean lines and subtle energy glows (blue/green). Show it integrated into a factory or plant setting. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: modern, efficient, clean. Colors: Industrial grays, whites, with SEES blue/green accents (#0056b3, #10b981), and accents of #f59e0b. Lighting: Bright, functional. Focus: Compactness, efficiency, clean energy.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Emphasize the clean design and integration. Could be a short video showing the unit in operation.

prompts.name: Collaborative Industrial Gas Design
prompts.prompt: A diverse team of SEES engineers (Nigerian) in a collaborative setting, gathered around a large screen or table displaying a complex 3D model or engineering diagram of an industrial gas solution (e.g., an LNG/CNG plant layout, a gas pipeline network). They are actively discussing and pointing, conveying expertise and innovation. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: collaborative, intelligent, professional. Colors: Clean, modern office aesthetics with subtle SEES branding colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981). Lighting: Well-lit, focused on the team and display. Focus: Expertise, innovation, tailored solutions.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Focus on the team's interaction and the complexity of the design. Could be a short video of the team brainstorming or a 3D model rotating.

description: Visuals emphasizing cost savings and environmental benefits for vehicles and generators.

prompts.name: Auto-CNG Fueling Station
prompts.prompt: A modern vehicle (e.g., a car, a bus, or a truck) being refueled at a clean, well-designed CNG fueling station in Nigeria. The focus should be on the CNG pump and the vehicle's CNG tank being filled, with clear visual cues of 'CNG' or 'Gas'. Emphasize the ease and cleanliness of the process. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: clean, modern, accessible. Colors: Bright, functional, with SEES blue/green accents (#0056b3, #10b981), and accents of #f59e0b. Lighting: Clear, natural. Focus: Convenience, clean fuel, accessibility.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: A clear, aspirational shot. Could be a short video showing the quick fueling process.

prompts.name: Fuel Cost Comparison (Split Image)
prompts.prompt: A split image or composite. One side shows a traditional petrol/diesel pump with a high price displayed, conveying expense. The other side shows a CNG pump with a significantly lower price, conveying savings. Alternatively, one side shows a vehicle emitting dark exhaust, and the other shows a clean-burning CNG vehicle. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: contrast, problem-solution, clear. Colors: Muted/darker on the 'expensive/polluting' side; brighter, cleaner on the 'saving/green' side, incorporating SEES brand colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981). Focus: Cost savings, environmental benefits, clear choice.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Excellent for a before-and-after visual or a quick transition video. Ensure the price difference or environmental impact is immediately clear.

video_concepts.name: The Auto-CNG Advantage: Drive Green, Save Big (Problem/Solution)

prompt_elements: Opening: Visuals of high petrol/diesel prices at a pump, or a vehicle owner looking frustrated at their fuel bill. Text overlay: 'High Fuel Costs?'. Brand colors #0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981 should be subtly incorporated throughout.
